comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do no edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: mv_sort
description: Sorts a multivalued field in lexicographical order.

params.name: field
params.description: Multivalue expression. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: order
params.description: Sort order. The valid options are ASC and DESC, the default is ASC.

examples:

| EVAL sa = mv_sort(a), sd = mv_sort(a, "DESC")
